data.title: The Settlers: Rise of an Empire GAME DEMO - download
data.meta_description: Demo version of The Settlers: Rise of an Empire , a(n) strategy game, for PCs and laptops with Windows systems. Free and legal download. Enjoy! File Size: 1398.7 MB
data.text:
The Settlers VI is the next edition of the legendary series of strategy games, launched by the studio Blue Byte in 1993. After a very good acceptance by the fans of the previous episode, titled Heritage of Kings, the German company decided to return to the old Convention dorzucajac a handful of interesting news.

The main goal of the game is to manage the medieval town, ranging from a tiny village on a large and well fortified metropolis ending. At the beginning of the struggle, the user selects the hero who using its unique capabilities will support settlers in the cover the expansion of the village. A good example is the merchant, capable of singing push aside daily problems of existence, and hence increase the morale of individual residents.

Note: The Demo contains two maps are dedicated to the single player mode. The first is the tutorial, while the latter is called Arroyo and allows you to play in the mode "free settle".
